item.title: What is your opinion about Bitcoin and blockchain technology?
item.description:
What is your opinion about Bitcoin and blockchain technology?

Answer: In many ways, that is two questions. Bitcoin is a payment system. Blockchain is a software technique for managing virtual ledgers that is implemented through the use of multiple computers. Bitcoin uses the blockchain as the foundation of how it works. Bitcoin may or may not be around ...

item.title: Ethereum Price Analysis - Further Appreciation or Depreciation?
item.description:
Ethereum Price Analysis - Further Appreciation or Depreciation?

Ethereum price moved below the 100 SMA, but stayed above a support trend line. Can it recover or break the support to move down? Ethereum price moved below the 100 SMA, but stayed above a support trend line. Can it recover or break the support to move down?

item.title: The Crypto Show on the Arcade City experiment and yes it's working.
item.description:
The Crypto Show on the Arcade City experiment and yes it's working.

We focus the whole show on the arrival of Arcade City to Austin. Whether the App works or not on the Ethereum platform is irrelevant because the guerrilla marketing taking place on the interim Facebook page is amazing.

item.title: Centralized Monetary Systems Need To Be Replaced
item.description:
Centralized Monetary Systems Need To Be Replaced

There has been a lot of discussion as to why the banking ecosystem needs to change, rather than to stick to its centralised model. Then again, there are so many negative aspects associated with the money we use today; it becomes only more obvious centralised systems are on their way out.

item.title: Creating New Technology Standards For Bitcoin Core Development
item.description:
Creating New Technology Standards For Bitcoin Core Development

Throughout the years, several changes have been made to the Bitcoin Core code, allowing for new features, improved security, and ultimately, bigger network blocks. But it seems as if the developers want to revamp their code changes in the future, to engage more people in the future and development of Bitcoin.

item.title: Bitcoin Exchange Gatecoin Hacked; 250 BTC & 185,000 ETH Lost
item.description:
Bitcoin Exchange Gatecoin Hacked; 250 BTC & 185,000 ETH Lost

Gatecoin, a Hong Kong-based digital currency startup that has cited segregated client accounts as a way to minimize exposure to risks, suffered a breach and lost 250 BTC and 185,000 ETH, 15% of its crypto asset deposits. A cybersecurity firm, Tehtri Security, conducted a forensic investigation and confirmed the breach, Gatecoin announced in a statement by CEO Aur√©lien Menant posted on its website.

item.title: What is the best book about bitcoin?
item.description:
What is the best book about bitcoin?

Answer (1 of 2): The best book is hard to answer because bitcoin is so so dynamic. The surface has not be discovered therefore only a few scratches have been made or attempted. I suggest (from a close friend and Expertpreneur) Read Satoshi's White Paper. This is the whole concept of it's Creator...

item.title: Can blockchain technology reduce bureaucracy? How?
item.description:
Can blockchain technology reduce bureaucracy? How?

Answer (1 of 2): Blockchain technology is really good at one thing: reliable reconciliation. So if I say I sent you $10 but you say you didn't receive it, we don't have to have a battle of opinions and just refer to What the Blockchain Says. Bureaucracy technically refers to a government where d...

item.title: Does Coinbase represent a failure of Bitcoin idea?
item.description:
Does Coinbase represent a failure of Bitcoin idea?

Answer (1 of 6): Coinbase doesn't represent a failure of the bitcoin idea any more than keeping money in a bank represents a failure of fiat currencies. If anything, we are way behind the curve on allowing banks to hold bitcoin for their customers. If it was up to me, I would support immediate ...
